comment_text: I remember those (coincidentally 68020/2) back when I was working at Eicon's graphics group (now Eicon Networks). Ended up just using M68Ks with blitters for PostScript and HP PCL interpreters. In the end the HP version even lost the blitter chip and I had to write bitblt.s
author: karmakaze
story_title: The Texas Instruments TMX 1795: the first, forgotten microprocessor
